Deterministic.description: Enables reproducible builds, such that a given set of inputs will always produce byte-for-byte identical output

EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles.description: Controls whether source generated files will be saved.

CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath.description: Controls where source generated files are saved.

ProduceReferenceAssembly.description: Determines whether to produce a reference assembly.

ProduceOnlyReferenceAssembly.description: Indicates that the build should produce a reference assembly as the primary output, and not produce an implementation assembly.

OutputAssembly.description: The path and name of the output assembly

ReportAnalyzer.description: Report additional information about analyzers, such as execution time

PublicSign.description: Causes the compiler to mark the assembly as signed with a public key, without actually signing it

ReportIVTs.description: Causes the compiler to report information about `InternalsVisibleTo` attributes

NoCompilerStandardLib.description: Causes the compiler to not reference the `mscorlib` standard library. The build targets default this to `true` to suppress the compiler's implicit reference, and add an explicit reference to `mscorlib`. This explicit reference can be suppressed with the `NoStdLib` property.

NoStdLib.description: Causes the build targets not to add an explicit reference to the `mscorlib` standard library

ErrorEndLocation.description: Causes the compiler to report the line and column of the end location of each error

PreferredUILang.description: Specifies the language to be used for compiler output such as error messages and warnings

GenerateFullPaths.description: Cause the compiler to use full paths for filenames in output such as error messages

AdditionalLibPaths.description: Specifies additional directories for the compiler to search to find assemblies. This should not normally be used, as MSBuild resolves assemblies before passing them to the compiler.

AppConfigForCompiler.description: Specifies the path to an `app.config` application configuration file to pass to the compiler

PathMap.description: Specifies how to remap physical source paths when embedding source paths in compiler output such as debug symbols. Each item in the list is of the form `mappedPath=sourcePath`.

AddModule.description: Adds a module created with the `module` `OutputType` to the compilation.
